name: Bouncing Duck Simulator
description:
Bouncing Duck Simulator allows you to fulfill your wildest dreams. Bouncing a rubber duck around, bouncing a pink rubber duck around, bouncing... more ducks? Don't be shy, you gotta bounce them all!

The game features:
- A room made of 6 walls, allowing for crazy bouncing action!
- Three differents endings and hidden techniques/achievements, for a great replayability!
- A wide range of collectable ducks that you have to find to complete the Duckedex to 100%!
- Many duck combinations and non-linear gameplay, every playthrough is unique!
- Various duck sounds that will haunt you for days (months), even during your sleep!

Bounce your way to the ultimate title of Master Bouncer!
